title: Elegant Marrakech One- & Two-Bedroom Suites with Daily Breakfast & 27-Hole Golf Course
description:
Discover the magic of Marrakech at this timeless Moroccan estate. Featuring a sprawling, 27-hole golf course and a sparkling outdoor pool, this serene stay invites you to slow down - wander its peaceful gardens home to roaming peacocks, ducks and rabbits or unwind in your spacious suite.

Savour the flavours of Morocco at the hotel's traditional restaurant, where you can indulge in fresh tagines and local produce. For a change of pace, visit the nearby Jardin Majorelle, an artist's landscaped garden, or the Koutoubia Mosque, the largest mosque in Marrakech.
offer_address: BP1487، Circuit de la Palmeraie, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco

title: Marrakesh Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Tucked away in Marrakesh's exclusive Al Maaden district, this Moroccan hideaway offers a jaw-dropping mix of sleek opulence and old-world charm. Contemporary private villas are surrounded by perfectly manicured gardens. A short drive from the medina yet miles from ordinary, Al Maaden VillaHotel & Spa strikes that sweet spot of seclusion without isolation.

Dive into your stunning mosaic-tiled pool surrounded by swaying palms, or bliss out at the spa where thousand-year-old rituals get a 21st-century upgrade. The signature restaurant serves up melt-in-your-mouth tagines and Moroccan dishes, while the chic Blue Bar crafts masterful cocktails in an ambience of leather, warm wood, soft lighting and flickering candles.
offer_address: Sidi Youssef Ben Ali, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco

vendor_name: Palais Mirage d'Atlas - Luxury Hotel & Spa
title: Marrakesh Boutique Luxury Retreat with Heated Pool, Daily Breakfast & Lunch
description:
Experience the allure of Moroccan luxury at this majestic retreat, where traditional architecture, warm hospitality and a peaceful, tree-lined resort pool await.

For the ultimate indulgence, retreat to the onsite hammam, then spend lazy afternoons basking in the Moroccan sun by the heated pool and refreshing in the cold plunge pool. Unearth the secrets of bustling Marrakesh with a visit to the captivating Jardin Majorelle gardens or the vibrant Medina, where you can savour authentic Moroccan street food and admire the craftsmanship of local artisans.

When it's time to dine, delight in vibrant flavours at the onsite restaurant, with dishes crafted from local spices and ingredients. For an intimate evening, enjoy French-inspired fare on the rooftop terrace, dining under the stars for a truly romantic experience.
location_description: Palais Mirage d'Atlas - Luxury Hotel & Spa
offer_address: La Palmeraie, Bab Atlas, Dar Essadaka, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco

title: Boutique Morroccan Riad Luxury in the Heart of Marrakesh
description: Hidden within Marrakesh’s clamour of bright sights and profound sounds is the boutique, ultra-luxurious Angsana Riads Collection, a secluded, shaded oasis inhabiting stately Moroccan houses. Tucked in the heart of the city - an easy stroll from the street vendors and entertainers of the glorious Jemaa el-Fnaa - each of the six neighbouring riads is a work of art, lovingly preserved and featuring artisanal latticework, sweeping arches and hand-tiled mosaics. With onsite restaurant Si Said, two swimming pools, a world-class spa and gallery and an extensive wine cellar, an escape to the Angasana Riads Collection promises a thousand and one nights of delight.

title: Kenzi Menara Palace - LPC
offer_address: Zone de l’Agdal, Bd Mohamed VI, Marrakesh 40000, Morocco
